Job Title: Comms and PR Lead

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Adept is working to advance a people-centric approach to AI that optimizes for what’s actually most useful for people and their work. You can see this approach in the technology we’re building: models that are trained to use software and take actions just as a person would.

We’ve recently raised a $350M Series B led by General Catalyst and Spark, on top of a $65M Series A in 2022 with Addition and Greylock. We’re fortunate to be supported by amazing firms and angels such as Chris Re, Andrej Karpathy, Root Ventures, Howie Liu, Dara Khosrowshahi, and others, and were recently highlighted by Forbes. Adept is backed by a coalition of strategic partners, including Atlassian, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and Workday.

We're looking for passionate team members who want to swing for the fences to accomplish our mission, are excited by a startup environment where the hardest problems are yet to be solved, and are eager to learn and collaborate together in our San Francisco office.

For more information, check out our blog!

Position summary:

You will play a pivotal role in communicating the Adept story, building brand awareness, and driving strategies to amplify Adept’s unique take on AGI.

Responsibilities:

Own the overall comms strategy. Work with the team to determine our positioning, what initiatives we want to run, and how to build a comms function. Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with key media contacts, industry influencers, and thought leaders. Proactively pitch and secure media coverage in top-tier outlets to elevate Adept’s visibility. Support company leadership and spokespersons prepare for industry conferences and other media events. Work cross-functionally to establish Adept’s brand identity and employer brand. Integrate brand messaging into both internal-facing and external-facing communication materials. Own the content calendar and work alongside Product, Engineering, Research, and Design teams to draft compelling articles, blog posts, videos, and other multimedia assets that communicate Adept’s vision, product launches, and thought leadership. Lead social media strategy and execution, managing platforms such as Twitter, LinkedIn, and Adept’s Discord community. 

Qualifications:

8+ years of experience in PR, communications, or marketing roles, with a focus on technology or startup environments. Generalist mindset, and willingness to roll up your sleeves and act as a both a strategy-setter and individual contributor across a range of projects and needs. Deep interest and understanding of the emerging AI landscape and technologies, industry participants, and topics of interest. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail. Experience managing social media platforms and driving engagement. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, startup environment. 

The pay range for this position in California is $175,000 - $250,000yr; however, base pay offered may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, candidate location, and experience. We also offer competitive equity packages in the form of stock options and a comprehensive benefits plan. 

Our Benefits

Medical, dental, and vision insurance - 100% coveredUnlimited vacation time for exempt employees4 remote weeks per year - work from anywhereCompetitive salary & stock options 24 weeks paid parental leaveMonthly wellness stipendDaily meals for those in our comfortable SF office Commuter benefitsDog friendly office

Adept is an equal opportunity employer. We're excited about candidates who will raise the bar of our team, regardless of specific experiences -- we encourage applicants from a range of backgrounds to apply.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
